```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r}
criminal_data_raw <- read_csv("Data_Tables_Criminal_Incidents_Visualisation_Year_Ending_December_2019.csv")
```

```{r}
criminal_data <- criminal_data_raw %>%
  filter( Year >= 2010) %>%
  rename( "offense_division" =  "Offence Division")
```

```{r}
criminal_data_drug <- criminal_data %>%
  filter( offense_division == "C Drug offences") %>%
  arrange(Year)
```

```{r}
ggplot(criminal_data_drug, 
aes(x = "Rate per 100,000 population", y = Year) ) + 
geom_point()
```
